name: 陳金聖
objective: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計， (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹， (3)基礎迴授控制器設計， (4)前饋控制器設計， (5)估測器設計，(6)多軸路徑控制， (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體、LCD設備與機器人。學生從這門課程中可學到運動控制的理論與如何利用硬體控制平台去完成一套運動控制系統。
schedule:
Week 01, 2/22: Administrative/ Course introduction 
Week 02, 3/01: Introduction/ Path planning and trajectory generation
Week 03, 3/08: Path planning and trajectory generation
Week 04, 3/15: Introduction of motion control plant & feedback system
Week 05, 3/22: Introduction of motion control plant & feedback system
Week 06, 3/29: Overview of discrete control 
Week 07, 4/05: Holiday
Week 08, 4/12: Feedback control loop design 
Week 09, 4/19: Middle project or examination
Week 10, 4/26: System identification
Week 11, 5/03: Feedforward control loop design
Week 12, 5/10: Observer Design 
Week 13, 5/17: Observer Design and disturbance compensation
Week 14, 5/24: Multi-axis control
Week 15, 5/31: Real-Time control system
Week 16, 6/07: Holiday 
Week 17, 6/14: Lecture from industry
Week 18, 6/21: Final project presentation
materials:
Background Knowledge:
1. a or b (a. Automatic Control, Digital Signal processing,  b. Digital Control),
2. Matlab/ Simulink: simulation tool,
3. C/C++: implementation tool.
